titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 300 Fannin Street in Shreveport, Louisiana, as the "Tom Stagg Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 300 Fannin Street in Shreveport, Louisiana, as the "Tom Stagg United States Court House".
An act to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 300 Fannin Street in Shreveport, Louisiana, as the "Tom Stagg United States Court House".
To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 300 Fannin Street in Shreveport, Louisiana, as the "Tom Stagg United States Court House".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 471.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Davis, Rodney moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 2754.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at desk: House amendments to Senate bill.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendments to the Senate bill by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was passed by the House on September 26, 2016. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
This bill designates the federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 300 Fannin Street in Shreveport, Louisiana, as the "Tom Stagg United States Court House."
